report.title: Stimulation, Tension, Concentration Affected
report.author: eveningguru
report.bodytext: Total Water Drank throughout the day: 3,552ml (Every little bit needed.) /n /n 6:40am-8:10am No pronounced heart-rate changes. /n /n 8:00am- 200mg Caffeine /n /n 8:10am- Beginning Effects (light mental effects) /n /n 8:30am- 36-40 beats/minute /n /n 8:50am- Beginning of pronounced mental and physical effects. /n /n 8:50am-12:00pm Strongest effects prominent. /n -General sense of well-being. /n -Time speeds up. /n -Shaking of legs. /n -Perfectionism (Could just be natural inclinations released, as I usually do not have the drive.) /n -Very strong mental and physical drive to succeed/do well. /n -Focusing power and depth increased, also able to focus on multiple topics. /n -Slight boost to strength and endurance. /n -No hunger from 6:00am-8:10pm /n -Talkative, but not overly so. Very slight stumbling over words. /n -Am able to find interest in any subject. /n -Very mild dry throat. /n -Extremely clear-headed. /n -No loss of patience no contempt or disgust possible. /n /n 9:17am- 64 beats/minute /n /n 9:32am- Able to focus on bodily sensations much more than usual. /n /n 9:40am- 60 beats/minute /n /n 9:50am- Very slight light-headedness when moving or standing. /n -Tingling in the back of the head. /n /n 10:10am- Slightly tensed neck muscles. /n -Slight feeling of being flushed. (Not visible) /n /n 10:12am- Tingling moved to neck and top of head also. /n /n 10:25am- Tingling moved to shoulders and mid-back. /n /n 10:28am- All effects increased slightly. /n /n 10:30am- Tingling moved to throat also. /n -Very thirsty, but water doesn't help dry throat. /n /n 10:32am- Tingling moved to face, arms, and lower spine. /n (More pronounced while standing) /n /n 10:34am- Tingling on the sides of my neck, and lower arms, and hands. /n -Tingling also moving into chest and ribs. /n /n 10:35am- Whole upper body tingling and moving into legs. /n /n 10:58am- Tingling comes and goes like an electric massager. /n -My stomach does feel empty, but there is no hunger associated with it. /n -Heart-rate jumps wildly even at low exertion levels. /n /n 11:03am- Very slight headache gone by 11:27am. /n /n 11:16am- 200mg Caffeine /n /n 11:32am- 68 beats/minute /n /n 11:38am- Whole body is tingling /n -54 beats/minute /n /n 11:44am- 200mg Caffeine /n /n 12:00pm- 72 beats/minute /n /n 12:11pm- 64 beats/minute /n /n 12:13pm- Whole body is tingling, but I feel flushed, and there is no hunger at all. /n /n 12:23pm- 108 beats/minute after brief walk between english and friends at lunch. /n /n 12:30pm- Slight stomach ache. /n -Flushed feeling is gone. /n /n 1:00pm- Being with Carla at lunch and felt more affectionate than usual. /n -90 beats/minute /n -Noticeably higher sexual drive. /n /n 1:15pm- Effects still strong, but plateaued. /n -Still tingling at touch. /n -Mild sweating, due to raised body temperature. /n /n 1:22pm- Concentration, and drive effects still strong. /n -The elated, almost giddy feelings are completely gone. /n -Face tingling like crazy. /n /n 1:27pm- Neck muscles very tense. /n /n 1:31pm- Very light difficulty swallowing due to tight throat muscles. /n /n 1:35pm- 66 beats/minute /n /n 1:55pm- Mild light-headedness after short exertion. /n /n 2:28pm- Fast heart rate (unmeasured guessing around 60-70 beats/minute.) /n -Mild sweating continues, still due to raised body temperature. /n -Mental effects still strong, though they are beginning to taper off. /n /n /n 3:19pm- Increase in muscle tension. (Shoulders, neck, back.) /n -Mental effects tapering slightly more, though still noticeable. /n -Significantly less tingling. /n /n 3:00pm- Drastic drop in body temperature. /n /n 3:26pm- 100 beats/minute /n -Significantly less drive. (Only when compared with peak.) /n -Significantly less ability to concentrate. /n /n 4:00pm- Slight feeling of being hungry, but much less than would be expected. /n -Feelings of being tired, strung-out, and shitty. /n (Come and go every ten or fifteen minutes.) /n -Zero sex drive /n -Easier to begin work due to momentum from the day, however concentration and drive are no better than normal. /n -Tingling almost completely gone. /n -Neck muscles more tense than previously. /n /n 4:35pm- 72 beats/minute /n /n 5:19pm- All mental effects have worn off. /n -Very tense, and stressed. /n -Standing up even slowly makes me very dizzy. /n -My throat is slightly drier than previously. /n /n 6:27pm- Took four Bayer to combat extreme muscle tension. /n -Carla gave me a back massage which helped significantly. /n -Drank glass of orange juice to boost blood sugar. (Having not eaten.) /n -Another back massage, and most negative effects have gone. /n (Note: Had I not previously had problems with depression I would have thought that I was feeling very depressed or shitty. However, I was able to recognize it as mostly low blood sugar level, and stress.) /n /n 7:26pm- Tension only in wrists and forearms. /n -Still very small appetite. /n -Taking nap. /n -Took another two Bayer. /n /n 7:50pm- Finished nap took a wonderful feeling hot shower. (Very refreshing.) /n /n 8:10pm- Hunger hits in full force. /n -Still a little drained, but otherwise normal. /n /n The one thing I learned from this experience, is less caffeine. Also, I wouldn't want to use this drug/combination recreationally. It could very well have its uses depending on the situation though. Last minute studying, finals, or some other equally valuable use. I would suggest for most people to use much less caffeine than I did. The only reason I used so much is I am a heavy coffee drinker, and have a huge tolerance.
